spells.name: Darkvision, Communal
spells.description: As darkvision, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

spells.name: Find Quarry
spells.description: You can sense whether a particular creature is within 20 miles of your location.

spells.name: Named Bullet, Greater
spells.description: As named bullet, but deals 2 points of damage per caster level.

spells.name: Terrain Bond
spells.description: Treat the terrain you are in as a favored terrain for the spell's duration.
